dc:title: Day After Day - April 1945
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: New life brings joy and excitement to Maryfarm as Tamar gives birth to a baby girl while a new kid and new crops enrich the farm. A retreat and the Holy Week liturgy brings spiritual renewal to those at Easton.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 409 1945-04-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
